testcase.classname: Sign Up Functionality in elearningm1 Website
testcase.name: Add all mandatory fields to create an User
testcase.system-out: Given user should be on the main page.......................................passed When user clicks on SignUp..................................................passed And Enter all Mandatory fields "Yash123" , "Murthannagari", "xyz@gmail.com", "123abc11", "yashashwini", "yashashwini".passed And Click on Register.......................................................passed Then Registration Home Page will appear with message Dear "Yash123", "Murthannagari".passed And User Clicks on Profile Icon and Validate the Email "xyz@gmail.com"......passed And User Clicks on Compose Email Icon.......................................passed And User Enters all Mandatory Fields "abcd123" , "Imp", "Hello There".......passed And User Clicks on Send Message.............................................passed Then Message should be sent Successfully with success message having "abcd123".passed
